channel.title: Home on Cambridge Village HOA
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Cambridge Village HOA

item.title: Documents
item.description: HOA By Laws CAMBRIDGE VILLAGE - By Laws Declaration of Covenants, Conditions and Restrictions CAMBRIDGE VILLAGE - Declaration of Covenants, Conditions and Restrictions Architectural Guidelines and Request Form CAMBRIDGE VILLAGE - Architectural Standards Manual and Request Form Any questions or concerns? Please contact the board: board@cambridgevillagehoa.com

item.title: Meet the Board
item.description: President Dwayne M. Contact Email: president@cambridgevillagehoa.com Secretary Ebony G. Contact Email: secretary@cambridgevillagehoa.com Treasurer Wosene S. Contact Email: treasurer@cambridgevillagehoa.com

item.title: FAQ
item.description: How do I pay my HOA dues?   By mailing your check or money order to PO Box 577 Ocoee FL, 34761. Do I need an approval to paint my home?   Yes Do I need an approval to get a fence?   Yes What is the process to get approval for exterior changes for my home?   A completion and submission of the CAMBRIDGE VILLAGE - Architectural Standards Manual and Request Form is required.

item.title: Neighborhood Potluck
item.description: Saturday March 30, 2024 come have a meal with your neighbors! Bring your favorite international or American dish and enjoy a time of games and conversation as you get to know your neighbors!

item.title: Block Party
item.description: This event took place on Saturday May 20, 2023. We enjoyed our first ever neighborhood 2023 Block Party!
